titleStmt.title: Concordance lexical entry for lemma: NeededMixtecVocabulary20170806-TS.xml

cit.quote: In kua'a ka skua'i nuu universdad
A sister of mine studied at the university.
Mi hermana estudió a la universidad.
Ixi ntikachi ka va'i sa'a na sa'ma
The sheep's fur is good to make clothes with.
La lana de oveja es bueno para hacer ropas.
Put that baby on the clothes
Ponga este bebé su las ropas.
Remember where you left the money
Let's go to the store to buy nopales.
Vamos a la tienda para comprar nopales.
Before I lived in Puebla I used to live in Puebla
Wake up, lets go to the plaza.
Before I lived in Puebla I used to live in Puebla
I forgot what your name is.
Cook the chicken for us to eat
Cocina el pollo, para que comamos.
Tina luu sketa ti nuu yucha
The puppy is running on the rivier.
El cachorro corre por el río.
Vitsi nchu'a yee ta kuun savi
It's very cold when it rains.

sense.note: This is how you would refer to them all (i.e. all older women)

cit.quote: Before I lived in Puebla I used to live in Puebla
Cook the chicken for us to eat
Cocina el pollo, para que comamos.

form.note: New sense of "inkaa" meaning 'to have'. But this also exists with "yee", and "iin" so it's not really too surprising.

sense.note: New sense of "inkaa" meaning 'to have'. But this also exists with "yee", and "iin" so it's not really too surprising.

cit.quote: I forgot what your name is.
Do you understand how I am speaking? Do you understand what I am saying?

sense.note: Used with "kaa"; maybe should be "takaa (U) kaa"

El cachorro corre por el río.
